attributes.action: Demand full payment from Leeds united to their creditors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure an example is made of Leeds united to stop this mockery that is administration be seen as an easy and cheap way of football clubs writing off their debts ... it is through their own bad management that they have got into the mess in teh first place and us teh taxpaying public are essentially owed over £7m from this one club ... this should never be allowed to go on and this club (and all that follow it) should be made to pay the full amount owed to their creitors ...

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Demand full payment from Leeds united to their creditors."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12993.asp

Prime Minister's Office
